mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `order` ( order_no, session_id, user_id, price, alipay_trade_no, order_status, subject, body, create_time, update_time, pay_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{sessionId}, #{userId}, #{price}, #{alipayTradeNo}, #{orderStatus}, #{subject}, #{body}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{payTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, order_no as orderNo, session_id as sessionId, user_id as userId, price, alipay_trade_no as alipayTradeNo, order_status as orderStatus, subject, body, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, pay_time as payTime FROM `order` WHERE id = #{id}
